text:
RealScout - Software Engineer - Mountain View, CA (onsite or remote)

We help real estate agents collaborate with their clients in more personal, proactive, insightful and accessible ways (aka, sell more homes). Whereas Zillow and Trulia help connect home buyers to agents, we help agents move their clients who are serious about buying across the finish line.

We're looking for engineers who love new challenges and shipping great product.

About RealScout:

* grown from 2 to 30 employees since 2012 (https://www.realscout.com/team)

* open source across the stack - Ruby, AngularJS, ElasticSearch, PostgreSQL, Redis

* backed by prominent VC’s and angel investors including DCM, Joe Lonsdale / Formation 8 and Ken DeLeon, the number one Realtor® in the US

Feel free to email me at chris at realscout dot com anytime with any questions or to apply. Thanks!
